data.actual_result: The overlay doesn't appear but the game acts like it's visible (can't interact with the game)
data.expected_result: The overlay presents itself in all its glory
data.short_description: The overlay doesn't appear when the keybind is pressed
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a game - Ensure the overlay is enabled and the overlay is running for the game - Open the overlay with the keybind
